de.tum.in.osgi.utility.configuration

    public abstract class ConfigurationItem
extends Object
implements Serializable

    Title: ConfigurationItem

    Description: An abstract base class for configuration items

    Author:
    AMIT KUMAR MONDAL

      protected abstract void load(IConfigurationService scs)
      Fills the configuration item with values retrieved from the server configuration service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationItem

        public ConfigurationItem()

    • Method Detail

      • load

        protected abstract void load(IConfigurationService scs)
        Fills the configuration item with values retrieved from the server configuration service. Note: IConfigurationService.get(Class) calls this method. So, this method should use IConfigurationService.get(String) to retrieve the configuration values. This method is hidden, so only the ServerConfigurationService implementation can access it (via reflections)
        Parameters:
        scs - the server configuration service

      • save

        protected abstract void save(IConfigurationService scs)
        Saves the configuration item to the server configuration service. Note: IConfigurationService.set(ConfigurationItem) calls this method. So, this method should use IConfigurationService.set(String, String) to save the configuration values. This method is hidden, so only the ServerConfigurationService implementation can access it (via reflections)
        Parameters:
        scs - the server configuration service
